title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Migrated 13 JavaScript files to TypeScript, adding type annotations and interfaces for improved type safety.
Converted `next.config.js` to TypeScript (`next.config.ts`), replacing hardcoded logic with imported functions and defining `NextConfig` type.
Updated Dockerfile to reference `next.config.ts` instead of `next.config.js`.
Enhanced content linter rules with strict typing, error handling, and frontmatter validation.
Added type definitions to Liquid data tags, middleware, and test helpers.
Fixed potential issues like undefined checks and dynamic property assignments.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Migrated 13 JavaScript files to TypeScript, adding type annotations and interfaces for improved type safety.
- Converted `next.config.js` to TypeScript (`next.config.ts`), replacing hardcoded logic with imported functions and defining `NextConfig` type.
- Updated Dockerfile to reference `next.config.ts` instead of `next.config.js`.
- Enhanced content linter rules with strict typing, error handling, and frontmatter validation.
- Added type definitions to Liquid data tags, middleware, and test helpers.
- Fixed potential issues like undefined checks and dynamic property assignments.
